channel.title: libcrux on Cryspen
channel.description: Recent content in libcrux on Cryspen

item.title: Verified ML-KEM (Kyber) in Rust
item.description: ML-KEM, previously known as Kyber, is the first post-quantum secure key-encapsulation mechanism (KEM) to get standardised by NIST in FIPS 203.

item.title: Cryspen @ RWC 2023
item.description: At Real World Crypto 2023 in Tokyo, we gave a talk on the hacspec language, the hax tool, and the libcrux crypto library.
